Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Charged Javelin]{Charged Javelin}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Bottle the Storm]{Bottle the Storm}

You control electricity, thunder, and storms.
name: Lightning Domain
